channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - March 11, 2022
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Calendar video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-march-11-2022) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we've got sessions of these great games:
* _Against the Vampire Conspiracy_ * _Burning Hearts Forever_ * _Cthulhu Dark_ * _Delta Green_ * _Dungeons & Dragons 5E_ * _Fate of the Faerie Queen_ * _Godbound_ * _Gun & Slinger_ * _Old School Essentials_ * _Stars in the Dark_ * _This Night On the Rooftops_ * _Uncharted Worlds_ * _Urban Shadows_ * _What's so tempting about the Dark Side?_
Thanks go out to all this week's facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Calendar category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-calendar) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Calendar](https://gauntletcalendar.com/events) to play!

item.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - March 11, 2022
item.dc:creator: @flatvurm
item.description:
@flatvurm wrote:

Greetings, all! This week’s Gauntlet Calendar video roundup post is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we’ve got sessions of these great games:

  • Against the Vampire Conspiracy
  • Burning Hearts Forever
  • Cthulhu Dark
  • Delta Green
  • Dungeons & Dragons 5E
  • Fate of the Faerie Queen
  • Godbound
  • Gun & Slinger
  • Old School Essentials
  • Stars in the Dark
  • This Night On the Rooftops
  • Uncharted Worlds
  • Urban Shadows
  • What’s so tempting about the Dark Side?

Thanks go out to all this week’s facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the Gauntlet Calendar category on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the Gauntlet Calendar to play!
